有次同個fd去日本旅行,有日去到間成人玩具既鋪頭 入面有隻咩催情朱古力,我地覺得新奇就買左一盒

夜既返到酒店,我同我個fd就諗住試下 點知我地不知不覺咁食左成盒 之後開始黎料,我地下面越黎越硬 開始時大家都只係係床上打j 點知扛極都唔出,反而更想扑野

於是我fd忍唔住想插我 點知試左好耐都唔得 之後轉我插佢都插唔入

最後我地69幫大家含到出 完事之後仲攬住訓 到第二日大家就當無事發生過

於是我fd忍唔住想插我 點知試左好耐都唔得 之後轉我插佢都插唔入

最後我地69幫大家含到出 完事之後仲攬住訓 到第二日大家就當無事發生過

巴打受氣氛野係指ambient？

一直都覺得 “幾時接觸“ 係好影響接受度，唔係話幾時post rock高峰，而係幾時自己個心態個吸收力。你如果叫我而家先第一次聽industrial noise既話係無可能入到耳，但後生時個心景同音樂圈環境會provide到好大既虛心同寬容度。就好似，如果你有同國內班後生傾，會發覺佢地接受能力遠比香港好。就係因為佢地對音樂個切入點比我地原始單純。

post rock（嗱我真係唔熟）個arrangement同結構係同傳統rock背道而馳，但個sound係好美式既rock，特別係高潮山頂位，如果你就咁聽呢part，完全就係rock味十足可以跟住chok頭嗰隻。
用lego可以砌好多唔同野但一睇就知係lego。

我個人定義係，所有類型都可以氣氛化。正如所有類形都可以迷幻不過d人name左某一類迷幻叫Psychedelic。

Post Rock一開始出現其實冇乜感情 純粹係搖滾樂上既一種顛覆
係去到中間開始愈來愈多band玩感情 玩情緒 變左濫情 .....

濫情我受但真係首首都濫得好行，好似d亦舒小說咁大橋都一樣。比d 張愛玲睇下好無。。。

哈我都唔想做老鬼架但無可否認越黎越多野睇唔順眼。只係，晌一個唔熟既圈子會收句聲，唔似老虎你踩咁應。
前面提到既ambient又係。
無錯ambient出發點係搞氣氛，但其實意圖係要聽眾不知不覺咁 “被氣氛“。所以早期ambient都係好小心經營、偷偷摸摸咁盡力唔draw 到你attention。
但自從ambient上左台面就越黎越sound track化，慌死你錯過左佢d idea咁。

近年既indie比我感覺係好 “刻意“，無左當初嗰種好自我、理得你死既瀟灑。而家既indie我覺得似Bob Dylan嗰種認真做音樂既人，只不過呢類音樂人當年可以係pop，而家就只有被邊沿為indie，真正既alternative更加係賣少見少。

Anyway，聽歌姐其實好聽就得。多謝比我發洩下。

Anyway，聽歌姐其實好聽就得。多謝比我發洩下。

Indie個初衷真係有排講
作為聽眾，都係啱聽就算

講起EBM, 先幾日我睇左個techno artist的live set
事前完全唔識果位artist
只憑佢既奇怪音樂、造型，同自己飲左兩罐，令我聽得好投入。

佢叫Thegn。

https://m.soundcloud.com/thegn-joynet/live-tsunawatari

因為佢既音樂單調而奇怪，單調唔係果種輕浮既minimal techno
而係有重型而具侵略性既拍子果種
最開頭令我投入既就係音樂既單調
但單調之中會有d即興既元素，例如一d吶喊式既vocal
好少係XXX會聽到呢d怪人式既舞曲

當晚場live set同上面條link一樣都係用首日本舊歌來開場同作結....

點解講EBM會諗到佢
因為佢果set完左我即刻google下佢
佢bandcamp都有ebm tag
我本來都唔知EBM咩來 (而家都唔知)

‘I, Awake’ is the new album from progressive, sludge, horror synth outfit Upcdownc. Following 17 years of producing constant heavy, instrumental, fuzzy noise this will be the band’s first album as a 3 piece. 唔講碟想講下人。
最鍾意既三個女人入面有兩位係天才少女，毛都未齊靚妹仔就曲詞編彈唱全能，仲要係身材極好!
英國呢邊有Kate Bush、美國嗰邊係呢位Lydia Lunch。

Lydia 有兩樣野Kate 無既。一就係佢把咀，唔係用黎唱而係用黎噏，好很勁既一把咀。
呢瓣我唔夠料介紹有興趣自search：lydia lunch spoken word。
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k9Rv5J77O0U

而另外一種才能就係腳頭好！
極濫交既佢帶挈過唔少boss級人物包括：
Nick Cave/Rowland Stuart Howard (Birthday Party)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bBdK7PZSCxw

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qQ_PftHVXTs


Sonic Youth（Kim Gordon嗰種死唔斷氣唱腔就係源自Lydia）
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6MSJ8qWcmQY


Michael Gira (Gira同佢出過一餅 “噏鳩“ 卡帶，對了解早期Swans意識形態會有用。)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5ysyB_rhAWs


Einsturzende Neubauten（當時仲係得三條小朋友）
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I2IaelXaW8Q


Clint Ruin (即係Foetus）
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TZZZ5DAwyHw


Marc Almond （另一位濫交者）
Steven Severin （Siouxsie個bass佬）
Robert Quine （呢位個結他都幾易認，彈過John Zorn Tom Waits Lou Reed Eno Marianne Faithful。。。）
James Chance （唔少得呢位No Wave旗手。Lydia 同佢組隊時只係16歲）

其實唔太想用呢種群星拱照方式去推介，不過Lydia Lunch人氣真係出奇地低，同輩份完全唔成正比。

No Wave 係一陣好快吹完又無乜人記得既風，但佢帶出既NOISE元素對日後indie影響深又遠，肯定遠過Punk。Punk既貢獻更多係思想層面。

Lydia Lunch就算當年都只係得“江湖地位“，另外兩樣都唔高，所以佢晌行內好受追捧，新仔黐到埋佢度算係一種光榮。但唔知真係腳頭好定有慧眼，伯樂命。

曹仁超於1947年在上海出生，出身於富裕之家，其祖父為上海灘煙草大亨，出產「美麗牌」香煙。不過由於共產黨取得政權，祖父的家產被充公，年僅3歲的曹與父母於1951年逃亡到香港後家財盡失，與家人居住位於北角的板間房，而父親亦不幸中風而去世。其後有一次被鄰居懷疑偷去一粒金子，被搜身後並向他說「今次算你好彩，不過你咁窮，遲早你都係做賊！」。他經一事後明白窮人的生活不能接受，發誓要出人頭地。

哈終於淪落到做文青。
其實我仲有一張想買。

睇一隊瞭如指掌既樂隊，唔需要佢地演出好完美。

聽到佢地係live點「造」返成首歌出黎仲有樂趣。

可能係同一個chord底但變左arppegi，
又或者條riff既走法唔同左，
落到現場支結他個gain攞大d聽又有唔同感覺。

可能人聲harmony其實唔一定係要三度五度?
可能其實d鼓可以多d花?

錄碟只有一個版本，出到碟之前編完又編，一首歌其實有無限可能性。

當你聽一隊band聽倒背如流，就好似whiplash個主角背晒成份鼓譜「I know it by heart, every measure」，先可以真正享受到睇live既樂趣。

就好似自己都拎緊件無聲既樂器同佢地神交一樣。

利申perfect pitch

都係會呆一呆 嚇一嚇

Dima (real name Dimitry Marakov) was born in 1986 in the town of Nalchik, Russia. From a young age, he dreamed of working in the fashion industry as a designer. Lacking the moral or financial support of his parents, he actively sought out contacts within the industry through the internet. At the age of 14, he became acquainted with a successful fashion photographer in St. Petersburg who invited the boy to come live with him and work as his assistant. Dima accepted the offer and moved in with the photographer. According to friends of Dima, he became the older man’s lover for approximately the next year. He eventually grew dissatisfied with the lack of benefits he had been promised would result from the arrangement. He left the photographer to become live-in lovers with a wealthy man who provided the financial backing for a conglomerate of pornographic gay websites. It was at this point that Dimitry adopted the stage name Dima and, with the help of false documents that corrected his age to the legal 18, began a successful career modeling naked and starring in hardcore sex videos on the gay websites financed by his lover.

Between the age of 15 and 18, Dima was a highly sought after pornographic model and performer. He saved the money he made from modeling to pay for the tuition at a leading college of fashion that he hoped to attend when he reached 18. At a certain point, Dima began supplementing his income by renting himself out as an escort within his lover’s circle of associates and acquaintances. According to friends of Dima, they included several leading figures in the entertainment industry as well as one of the most powerful men in Russia’s world of organized crime. Dima began to express concern to his friends that the organized crime figure had become obsessed with him, but he refused to accept their advice to stop seeing the man because of the large amount of money these dates were earning him. Sometime in 2005, Dima abruptly left his lover, gave up his modeling career, cut off all communication with his friends, and moved in with the organized crime figure. The last public Dima sighting was late that year when his friend Ignat Lebedev, who was also working as a male escort at the time, accompanied a client to a private sex club where he claims to have witnessed a very thin and confused looking Dima being forcibly sodomized by a group of perhaps ten to fifteen men. Lebedev claims his client identified one of the men as the organized crime figure and dissuaded him from speaking to Dima for his own protection.

Lebedev claims he described what he’d seen to Dima’s former lover and was told Dima had been killed the previous week and that he shouldn’t speak of this again. Lebedev reported both incidents to the police, but after interviewing the lover and being told Lebedev had made the story up, they declined to investigate the matter. In 2006, Lebedev persuaded a prominent Russian gay journalist to write an article on Dima’s disappearance, but during the course of investigating the story, the writer was abducted by unknown assailants, beaten, and told he would be murdered if he wrote the story. Dima has not been seen or reliably heard from in three years, although in early 2007 another organized crime figure, Evgeny Ershova, who was awaiting trial on an unrelated murder charge, claimed that in late 2005 he witnessed a young male prostitute matching Dima’s description be pushed out of a helicopter over a remote forest in the north of Russia. Before Dima’s ex-lover died of lung cancer in late 2007, he reportedly confessed to friends that Dima was sold as a sex slave to a man in the Ukraine in late 2005 and had lived until late 2006 when he’d committed suicide.

ALRAKIS - ALPHA ERI



https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n8F8UzWEyDI

Black Gaze/ Black Metal

用宇宙做題材既Black Metal 我第一隊就諗起佢地(聽得少)
隻碟主要結合drone synth 入氛圍黑金 盡可能每首歌都營造宇宙feel既迷離空間感
主音歌聲係樂器既一種 完全唔突出於音樂聲 不過對於建立melody方面起左個好重要既作用
依一隻係stunning debut album 可惜談論既人好少 厚重而大氣感強 好浩瀚又好壓迫 好靚


THE ANGELIC PROCESS ‎- WEIGHING SOULS WITH SAND



https://profoundlorerecords.bandcamp.com/album/weighing-souls-with-sand

Doom Metal/ Shoegaze

有人形容係金屬樂中既毒藥 聽後會成癮 唔好問我點解 我唔知
依隻係一隻較暗而不黑既專輯 飄渺 混濁但唔絕望 不過個人覺得唔應該日日聽 因為果種慢慢浸蝕人心
暗淡既負面情緒的確對好多投入既聽眾黎講比較危險
又慢又懾人既音壓同音牆會令人不自覺忘記左樂隊埋藏左既惡意

一張好好既Metalgaze 作品 有資格同07年Souvenirs d'un autre monde並列為當年既the best


另外仲有兩張比較有名既作品 Sunbather 同Ashes Against the Grain
唔講啦

https://deadhorse.bandcamp.com/album/we-can-create-our-own-world

不過要對自己坦白
